## TransferManager.download() method

Downloads a URL and returns the response.

Does not merge multiple requests to the same URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
download(url: RequestInfo, init?: RequestInit): Promise<Response>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | RequestInfo | The URL to download. |
|  init | RequestInit | Optional extra parameters for the download. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Response&gt;
